plot: Three boys who are curious about death night and day meet an old man who would not go away easily. A match between audacious kids' absurd imagination and an unapproachable old man is about to happen.
title: Hangul
plot_es: Three boys who are curious about death night and day meet an old man who would not go away easily. A match between audacious kids' absurd imagination and an unapproachable old man is about to happen.
